name: Vigo One Handle Single Hole Kitchen Faucet with Deck Plate

reviews.name: Vigo Pull-Out Spray Kitchen Faucet with Deck Plate, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I installed this very easily and it seems to work extremely well! Vary pleased with my purchase!
reviews.title: solid and well made

reviews.name: Vigo Pull-Out Spray Kitchen Faucet with Deck Plate, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this tap on line 02/25/2015 it fit perfectly under our kitchen window sill which has very little clearance in hight . The installation of the water supply hoses was a little tricky as it was hard to get a wrench on the tap line while applying the water supply hoses. But after this small hickup all is working well.We love this tap and i would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good quality kitchen tap.
reviews.title: Great kitchen tap

reviews.name: Vigo Pull-Out Spray Kitchen Faucet with Deck Plate, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: I love my new vigo faucet-- would definitely recommend!
reviews.title: Sturdy and sleek - Excellent

reviews.name: Vigo Pull-Out Spray Kitchen Faucet with Deck Plate, Stainless Steel
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy beautiful pull out faucet at a great value !
reviews.title: High Quality - Great Value
